2102230.name: Call to Strike
2102230.description:
Sit in the cockpit of the first battalion commander of the Tactical Response Unit (T.R.U.), a newly established joint multi-service military task force. T.R.U. stands as a swift and decisive response force designed to neutralize threats efficiently.




Born in the wake of a devastating assault on the United Alliance homeland, T.R.U. is charged with executing a range of search and destroy missions to safeguard our nation's security.

As the commander, you must lead your team with precision and strategy to combat the dangers that threaten our borders.





  • Dynamic Gameplay: Take on daring missions to seek and destroy enemy units, rescue, refuel, and upgrade your arsenal to overcome the odds!
  • Engaging Campaign: Immerse yourself in a fast-paced storyline while mastering new aircraft.
  • Refreshed mechanics: Experience a beloved perspective revitalized with better graphics, more speed, and bigger explosive action.
  • Quick Combat Missions: Jump into fast-paced sorties perfect for players on the move or with limited time.
  • Adaptive Challenge: Enjoy balanced gameplay where enemies scale with your skill level, ensuring an enjoyable experience for both beginners and veterans.
  • Challenge yourself: Test your skills with VIP pickups, total annihilation of enemy forces, or race against the clock for speedrun glory.
  • Dynamic weather: Wind affect your chopper, flares, and boats. Fog and dust obscure visibility, while nighttime operations keep you stealthy, adding unique dynamics to your mission.
  • Map Editor: Design custom missions, adjust location biomes, control weather conditions and time of day, and craft unique challenges to share with the community.
  • Control: Controller, Mouse and Keyboard or Keyboard Only Support.
2102230.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
